summary: Completed comprehensive frontend UI testing for the FULL redesigned lesson page. All 15 requested features tested and working correctly. The new 'Teacher's Desk' split layout with left sidebar, warm paper background (#F9F7F1), and Crimson Text serif font has been verified.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Full lesson page redesign has been verified. All new layout and functionality working correctly.

1_sidebar_navigation.notes: Left sidebar shows all 7 lesson sections with icons and durations (Opening & Welcome 5min, Scripture Reading 10min, Teaching Time 10min, Interactive Activity 10min, Craft Time 8min, Discussion Questions 5min, Closing & Prayer 5min)

2_sidebar_collapse_expand.notes: Sidebar toggle works - collapses to w-16 and expands to w-72

3_mobile_hamburger_menu.notes: Mobile hamburger menu (390x844 viewport) opens Lesson Flow drawer with all 7 sections

4_print_button.notes: Print button found and enabled - opens print preview in new window

5_export_button.notes: Export button opens modal with PDF and Word format options plus 'Export as PDF' button

6_add_to_calendar.notes: Add to Calendar opens modal with Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar options, Date/Time pickers, and Create Event button

7_map_quiz_supplies_toggles.notes: All 3 toggle buttons switch between active/inactive states with correct colors (emerald/indigo/orange)

8_scripture_lookup.notes: Scripture lookup button opens drawer with search, multiple translations (KJV, WEB, BBE, OEB-US), common references, and Insert/Copy/New Search buttons

9_memory_verse_display.notes: Memory verse displays correctly with quote decoration, italic text, and clickable reference (Mark 12:31)

10_section_expand_collapse.notes: Section cards expand/collapse on click - shows content with formatted text, bullet points, and numbered lists

11_mark_complete_button.notes: Mark Complete button toggles section completion - changes to 'Completed' state with checkmark

12_edit_mode.notes: Edit mode enables content editing - shows banner with 'Click any content to edit. Changes save automatically.' and Add Section button

13_section_navigation.notes: Next/Previous buttons work for section navigation - scrolls to and expands next section

14_cross_references.notes: Cross References section displays clickable Bible references (Galatians 6:2, Proverbs 3:27, etc.)

15_materials_checklist.notes: Materials Checklist section displays with clickable checkboxes for items like Bible, construction paper, handouts, scenario cards, etc. with category labels (essential, craft, activity, optional)

color_scheme.accent_colors: Amber for CTAs, Blue for scripture, Emerald for map, Indigo for quiz, Orange for supplies

layout.sidebar: Left sidebar with lesson flow navigation - VERIFIED
layout.main_content: Main content area with max-width 4xl - VERIFIED
layout.responsive: Mobile hamburger menu works at 390x844 - VERIFIED

verification_summary.visual_verification: Screenshots confirm new Teacher's Desk split layout with sidebar, warm background, serif typography
